text: It’s a fun, lighthearted, and heartwarming story of friendship, acceptance, and differences aimed at kids and families. I love the colorful, vibrant animation that brings Dr. Seuss’s whimsical world to life. I love the original songs and likeable characters. It’s fun watch for families and all Dr. Seuss fans!
Wonderful movie with a positive message that is both relatable and authentic. Highly recommended!

A very watered-down adaptation that replaces the original, complex and important concept about the perils of groupthink and even fascism with the type of generic and message that can be found in just about any children's media you care to choose. A wasted opportunity in an age where the original message is more relevant to our children than ever before.
